resources.string:
North Economy Lot
Price: $5 for 11 mins - 3 hours
Price: $10 for 24-hour period (Maximum stay 90 days)
 
Free shuttle to terminal A or B
Patrolled by Orlando Police Department - Airport Divison

South Economy Lot
Price: $5 for 11 mins - 3 hours
Price: $10 for 24-hour period (Maximum stay 90 days)
 
Free shuttle to terminal A or B
Patrolled by Orlando Police Department - Airport Divison

North Cell Lot
Free parking

Drivers waiting to pick up passengers
 Can not be parked overnight

South Cell Lot
Free parking

Drivers waiting to pick up passengers
 Can not be parked overnight

Terminal A
Price: $2 for 21-30 minutes
Price: $1 for each additional 15 minutes (Maximum $19) 
Price: $19 per 24-hour period (Maximum stay 45 days)

Walking distance of A or B side terminal
Vehicles higher than 7 feet cannot be accommodated

 Rental cars are on level R1 and R2
Electric vehicles park on level 2, row A

Terminal B
Price: $2 for 21-30 minutes
Price: $1 for each additional 15 minutes (Maximum $19) 
Price: $19 per 24-hour period (Maximum stay 45 days)

Walking distance of A or B side terminal
Vehicles higher than 7 feet cannot be accommodated

 Rental cars are on level R1 and R2
Electric vehicles park on level 2, row P

Terminal C
Price: $2 for 21-30 minutes
Price: $1 for each additional 15 minutes (Maximum $17)
 Price: $17 per 24-hour period (Maximum stay 45 days)

APM ride is a 3 and a half minute ride to terminals A and B
 Vehicles higher than 8 feet cannot be accommodated

Terminal Parking
Price:Price: $2 for 21-30 minutes
Price: $1 for each additional 15 minutes (Maximum $19) 
Price: $19 per 24-hour period (Maximum stay 45 days)

nWalking distance of A or B side terminal
Vehicles higher than 7 feet cannot be accommodated
